text:
**🌡️ Repair work on heating networks**

Today from 9:00 AM, there is no hot water supply and heating in most dormitories.

Estimated return time: 12:00 PM on November 12.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Repair work on heating networks has resulted in a lack of hot water and heating in most dormitories since 9:00 AM today. The expected restoration time is 12:00 PM on November 12.
title: Heating Outage in Dormitories

text:
**News from the student campus**
🔸 An analysis of the financial and economic activities of the student campus for the period 2021-2023 has been conducted. A draft budget, procurement plan, and repair work for 2024 have been prepared and approved.

🔹 The renovation of the **gym in dormitory No. 7, which will also be used as a shelter**, has been completed.

🔸 The restoration of the stairs in dormitory No. 4 has been completed.

❤️ Take care of yourselves, use shelters during air alerts! 
Student campus KPI @studmisto. Have questions or suggestions? **Contact us - ****@kpi_studmisto_bot****. Good luck!**
rephrased_news: An analysis of the financial and economic activities of the student campus from 2021 to 2023 has been completed, along with the approval of a draft budget, procurement plan, and repair work for 2024. Renovations of the gym in dormitory No. 7, which will serve as a shelter, have been finished, as well as the restoration of the stairs in dormitory No. 4.
title: Campus Renovations and Budget Approved

text:
⚠️ **Emergency**

Emergency power outage across the Shulyavka area and KPI.

Estimated return time according to DTEK is 6:00 PM.

If you need to recharge, approach the guards for a power bank.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: An emergency power outage is affecting the Shulyavka area and KPI, with an estimated restoration time of 6:00 PM according to DTEK. Power banks are available from the guards for those needing to recharge.
title: Emergency Power Outage Alert

text:
💡**Power outages**

Starting from May 16, hourly power outages may occur in Kyiv and the student campus according to the [schedule](https://www.dtek-kem.com.ua/ua/shutdowns) of Ukrenergo and DTEK.

Preliminary outages may occur [from](https://t.me/suspilnenews/32727) 12:00 AM to 9:00 AM or from 4:00 PM to 12:00 AM.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Hourly power outages may begin in Kyiv and the student campus starting May 16, following the schedule from Ukrenergo and DTEK. Preliminary outages are expected from 12:00 AM to 9:00 AM or from 4:00 PM to 12:00 AM.
title: Hourly Power Outages Scheduled

text:
🌡️ **Well, you get it**

**Kyivteploenergo promises to finish work by 11:00 PM every day, but "something" is going off plan.**

Estimated time: by the end of the month. Probably in 2024.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Kyivteploenergo has stated that repair work is expected to be completed by 11:00 PM daily, but there are delays. The completion is now anticipated by the end of the month, possibly extending into 2024.
title: Heating Work Delays Expected

text:
🟢 **Directorate 06.08**

**Settlement**
Will begin on August 26, and by the end of the week, there will be lists for settlement from faculties and institutes. In total, about 9,000 students are planned to be brought out for mixed learning.

**Masters**
By August 2, they were supposed to write a [request](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13FJxmoUKzXYeRo9T8oGxshdi3MXm1faIDpQwAO6Tk1E/edit?usp=sharing) for a change in payment format and extension of residence in the dormitory until August 31.

If you haven't written a request, contact the manager.

**Hot water**
In some dormitories, there has been no hot water for 3 months due to major repair work.

**Elevators**
Due to the stabilization of electricity supply, the operation of most elevators will be restored.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Settlement for approximately 9,000 students is set to begin on August 26, with lists from faculties and institutes to be provided by the end of the week. Masters students were expected to submit requests for changes in payment format and dormitory residence extension by August 2. Some dormitories have been without hot water for three months due to major repairs, but the operation of most elevators will resume due to stabilized electricity supply.
title: Settlement and Hot Water Issues

text:
[​​](https://telegra.ph/file/b793c7b6b4d653e40c4f4.jpg)🙌 **Recruitment of volunteers to assist with settlement**

We are looking for volunteers who are ready to help settle newcomers! This is a great opportunity to meet new people and make the lives of first-year students in the campus easier.

If you have some free time and want to do something useful – fill out the [form at the link](https://forms.gle/3i48ThrZcRTxM3e68) **by August 25 inclusive.** We look forward to having you on our team!

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Volunteers are being recruited to assist with the settlement of newcomers at the campus. Interested individuals can fill out a form by August 25.
title: Volunteers Needed for Settling

text:
🌡 **Hot water outage**

**Due to emergency work, there is no hot water in some dormitories due to Kyivteploenergo.**

Hot water supply is planned to be restored by the evening of August 29.

@kpicampus
rephrased_news: Due to emergency work by Kyivteploenergo, there is currently no hot water in some dormitories. The hot water supply is expected to be restored by the evening of August 29.
title: Hot Water Supply Disruption
